Title: Painting and Sculpture Changes 2008

Date

Tue Jan 01 2008 until Wed Dec 31 2008

Location
  • MoMA type:exhibition building spaces
  • 11 West 53rd St. type:thoroughfare names

www.moma.org

Carried out by

The Museum of Modern Art

There were 115 persons who influenced this exhibition.
